fields.headline: An Xbox for £30....
fields.bodyText: Games console buyers are familiar with Christmas bundles -- you get a bunch of free games that would nominally cost more than the console, but you probably don't want them and wouldn't buy them anyway. The new Xbox bundle could look like a typical example, but at least it includes both of the Xbox "show off" games, Halo and Splinter Cell. Since most Xbox owners probably would pay for both, it looks like a good deal.
